text.en_US:
A modified \c[3]Cold Virus\c[0] that's said to have originally come from some \c[3]far off wasteland\c[0]. It seems that somewhere along the line though that \c[3]they lost their ability to multiply\c[0] like their original counterparts could.
However, they have gained the ability to \c[3]temporarily increase their ally's Defense\c[0] while \c[1]also being able to lower yours\c[0], so be careful! A well aimed charged shot should be able to knock them off balance while they have their shields down!
